channel.title: Newest Update n2
channel.description:
Rate from 0-10
Just finished it Guys w00t!!!
Slayer!,u can get slayer task from the slayer master,she will tell u what to kill (random monster) based on ure slayer level to higher slayer the stronger the monster, and give u a random amount to kill the higher slayer the higher this amount
the amount and what u need to kill can be checked whit the enchanted gem,u will not get exp by killing task gaven monster but u will get the main amount of exp at the end of finishing your task :) this will prevent players from having high slayer agaiinst low level monsters ;) what a fix ^^ slayer monsters will rare drop slayer tokens from there type of monster these tokens will be used in a fututre update (contruction)
like it :p ?
